about.title: About Kiki Empanadas
about.content: Founded in Orlando, FL, Kiki Empanadas brings a taste of Argentina to your doorstep with our authentic, handcrafted empanadas. From traditional recipes to innovative flavors, we pride ourselves on quality and taste.

testimonials.feedback: Every bite takes me back to Argentina - absolutely delicious and authentic!
testimonials.author: Maria G.

testimonials.feedback: The catering service was a hit at my event! Everyone loved the variety of flavors.
testimonials.author: Ethan K.
